root.name: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Iwake Ganai: Portable ga Tsudzuku Wake Ganai
root.description: The second OreImo game for the PSP. A visual novel based on the light novel/anime series of the same name. The sequel game features an all-new original story scenario, new story routes, and new characters. Original creator Tsukasa Fushimi served as chief supervisor for this release.
